text: Lynni Treekrem in 1976 Lynni Treekrem (born 26 December 1958) is a Norwegian singer and composer. She was born in Seattle, Washington, US, and grew up in Kristiansund. Her album Haugtussa from 1995 earned her Spellemannprisen. Among her other albums are Storm from 1997, and Sweethearts from 2004. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Musicians from Seattle Category:People from Kristiansund Category:American emigrants to Norway Category:Norwegian female singers Category:Norwegian composers Category:Spellemannprisen winners
title: Lynni Treekrem
